snippet: New York City has begun preliminary talks with labor unions as it aims to break the deadlock in a years-old pay dispute that city workers say has left them owed up to $8 billion....

headline.print_headline: NYC Labor Talks Make Tentative Start in $8 Billion Pay Dispute
headline.main: NYC Labor Talks Make Tentative Start in $8 Billion Pay Dispute

lead_paragraph: New York City has begun preliminary talks with labor unions as it aims to break the deadlock in a years-old pay dispute that city workers say has left them owed up to $8 billion.
